text:
In the jmeter script, it use _java=`type java | awk '{ print $ NF }'` to get the java file.
While on my mac machine , it returns "Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin/Contents/Home/bin/java)"

Why don't use which java, it works fine on my machine.

WeideMacBook-Pro:bin weiyi$ type java
java is hashed (/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin/Contents/Home/bin/java)
WeideMacBook-Pro:bin weiyi$ which java
/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin/Contents/Home/bin/java
creator: sc.yiwei@gmail.com
emi@apache.org
text:
Could you confirm your macOS and java version with

$ sw_vers
$ java -version

Closing as no more details provided by reporter.
It works for me under Mac OSX.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
